description: Comprehensive library of all drone inspection tasks

TSK-SAF001.title: SAFETY BRIEFING: Review critical safety requirements
TSK-SAF001.description:
Safety First - This checklist is critical for safe drone operation.

Just Culture - Report any mistakes or concerns without fear of blame.
Attention to Detail - Follow each task in order. Do not skip steps.
Use PPE - Always wear required safety gear.
Report Issues - Document any abnormalities immediately.

KEEP THE DRONE POWERED ON until explicitly told to turn it off.
instructions: Read and understand all safety requirements.
Confirm PPE is available and worn.

TSK-PRS001.title: PRS: Disarm the parachute system safely
TSK-PRS001.description:
ALWAYS WEAR SAFETY GOGGLES AND HEARING PROTECTION WHEN HANDLING THE PRS FUSE.

Switch the parachute fuse just below the PRS tube to "SAFE".
instructions: Put on safety goggles and hearing protection.
Locate PRS fuse below the PRS tube.
Verify switch is secure in SAFE position.

TSK-PRS002.title: PARACHUTE SYSTEM: Complete system inspection
TSK-PRS002.description:
Inspect entire parachute system for integrity.

YELLOW LID: Check for cracks, verify evenly pressed, no fabric protruding.
TUBE: Verify securely mounted and fully seated, no structural damage.
LINE & COLLECTOR: Line collector intact, no excessive slack, line retained in backpack.
FUSE SWITCH: Structurally intact with red cap mounted.
instructions: Inspect yellow lid for cracks and proper seating.
Verify no parachute fabric visible outside lid.
Check tube is secure and undamaged.
Verify line collector intact with proper tension.
Check fuse switch intact with red cap.

TSK-PRS003.title: PRS: Arm the parachute system safely
TSK-PRS003.description:
FINAL CRITICAL STEP - ARM PARACHUTE

ALWAYS WEAR SAFETY GOGGLES AND HEARING PROTECTION.
Switch the parachute fuse below PRS tube to "DANGER".
After arming the PRS, DO NOT approach the drone.
instructions: Put on safety goggles and hearing protection.

TSK-SYS001.title: SYSTEM: Initiate telemetry transfer
TSK-SYS001.description: Connect the Ethernet cable and initiate telemetry data transfer from the drone.
instructions: Verify nav lights blinking yellow (transfer active).
Note: Continue checklist, will verify completion later.

TSK-SYS002.title: SYSTEM: Complete telemetry and secure ports
TSK-SYS002.description:
Finalize telemetry transfer and secure ports.

Confirm telemetry complete (nav lights not yellow).
If not complete after 10 minutes, stop and continue.
Remove Ethernet cable and store safely.
Securely lock Ethernet port cap.
Verify USB caps on both sides are sealed with silver cover.
instructions: Check nav lights no longer yellow.
If still yellow after 10 min, stop transfer.
Screw on Ethernet port cap completely.
Verify USB caps on both sides sealed with silver cover.

TSK-SYS003.title: SYSTEM STARTUP: Verify all systems initialize correctly
TSK-SYS003.description:
Confirm proper system initialization after first battery connection.

LIVEVIEW: Camera moves to end position then returns forward.
FLIGHT CONTROLLER: Initial beeping for 5-10s, then stops if untouched.
NAV LIGHTS: Snake pattern - Green (OK), Blue (OK with MedKit), other = contact pilot.
ONYX FAN: Verify fan on bottom spins (keep fingers clear).
instructions: Listen for flight controller beeping pattern.
Contact pilot if unexpected nav lights.

TSK-STR001.title: DRONE STRUCTURE: Comprehensive structural inspection
TSK-STR001.description:
Inspect all structural components.

MOTOR ARMS: Check for visual or structural damage.
CORE: Inspect for visual cracks.
LANDING GEAR: Check for cracks, verify connection (some play acceptable).
instructions: Inspect all motor arms for damage.
Confirm no excessive play in connections.

TSK-STR002.title: DRONE STRUCTURE: Open lids for battery access
TSK-STR002.description:
Open drone compartment for battery replacement.

Unscrew 4 screws holding the lids together using torque screwdriver.
Open lids to access battery compartment.
instructions: Unscrew 4 lid screws with torque screwdriver.
Open lids carefully for battery access.

TSK-STR003.title: DRONE STRUCTURE: Verify internal compartment
TSK-STR003.description: Inspect the internal battery compartment for cables, debris, moisture, and white seal integrity.
instructions: Check that the white seal is OK and undamaged.

TSK-STR004.title: DRONE STRUCTURE: Close the lids
TSK-STR004.description: Close and secure the battery compartment lids.
instructions: Ensure no gaps between lids and core.
Screw in 4 screws (2 per side) with torque screwdriver.

TSK-PRO001.title: PROPULSION SYSTEM: Full propulsion inspection
TSK-PRO001.description:
Complete propulsion system check.

PROPELLERS: Clean if needed, check for damage/cracks, inspect edges.
MOTORS: Check rotors, spin for smoothness, verify no abnormal sounds, check orange ESC cables.
AXIAL PLAY: Hold motor base, push/pull bell - no movement allowed.
ESCs: Verify no indications of loose mounting.
instructions: Spin each motor for smooth movement.
Check orange cables between ESC and motors.
Test each motor for axial play.

TSK-PER001.title: PERIPHERALS: All sensors and external components
TSK-PER001.description:
Inspect all peripheral systems.

4G ANTENNAS: Firmly mounted, 2 to sides, 2 angled down.
GPS MASTS: Structurally OK, both aimed forward.
REALSENSE: Front and downward lenses clean, no damage (use dry utilities only).
OPTICALFLOW: Clean, no dirt obscuring view.
DOWNLIGHT: Structurally intact on front right landing gear.
MINIFINDER: Mounted and holder intact.
instructions: Verify 4G antennas firmly mounted and positioned.
Check GPS masts structure and forward aim.
Clean RealSense lenses with dry utilities.
Verify Downlight intact on front right gear.

TSK-PER002.title: LIVEVIEW: Verify camera condition
TSK-PER002.description: Inspect the LiveView camera for structural integrity and clean the lens.

TSK-MRK001.title: MARKING: Verify all required markings
TSK-MRK001.description:
Verify drone and AED markings.

Permit number on rear arm (starting with "SWEbneâ€¦").
Onyx name and airframeID visible (e.g., "E3001" airframeID 1234C01B1124E3001).
Public instructions between middle and rear arms.
AED alarm device has power-off sticker.
instructions: Check permit number on rear arm.

TSK-BAT001.title: BATTERIES: Verify new batteries ready
TSK-BAT001.description:
Check new batteries are fully charged and undamaged.

Verify both batteries are over 50.3V.
Ensure batteries and connectors are undamaged.
Confirm batteries are clean and dry.
instructions: Verify both new batteries are over 50.3V.
Ensure batteries are clean and dry.

TSK-BAT002.title: BATTERIES: Remove and inspect old batteries
TSK-BAT002.description: Safely remove and inspect the old batteries from the drone.
instructions: Unplug both batteries with unplugging tool.
Check for any swelling or damage.

TSK-BAT003.title: BATTERIES: Put old batteries on charge
TSK-BAT003.description:
Connect old batteries to charging station.

Follow the instructions at the charging station.
Ensure batteries are properly connected to charger.
instructions: Follow instructions at the charging station.

TSK-BAT004.title: BATTERIES: Install front battery
TSK-BAT004.description: Install the front battery in the drone.
instructions: Secure velcro straps over battery wires.

TSK-BAT005.title: BATTERIES: Install back battery
TSK-BAT005.description: Install the back battery in the drone.
instructions: Secure velcro straps over battery wires.

TSK-PWR001.title: POWER SYSTEM: Inspect umbilical contact surfaces
TSK-PWR001.description:
Check umbilical for damage before connecting.

Inspect copper surfaces on umbilical (floor and drone landing gear).
Ensure no soot or residues from sparks.
Verify copper pins/pads are not bent or damaged.

TSK-PWR002.title: POWER SYSTEM: Attach umbilical to drone
TSK-PWR002.description:
Connect umbilical for power supply.

Connect umbilical next to the left landing gear.
Confirm connector is straight and fully connected.
instructions: Connect umbilical to left landing gear.

TSK-MED001.title: MEDKIT: Verify contents and AED status
TSK-MED001.description:
Verify MedKit contents and AED operational status.

Verify all utilities are included and in good condition.
Check AED is correctly placed inside MedKit.
Confirm AED status is OK.
Verify AED is dry, clean and free from damage.
instructions: Check AED is clean and undamaged.

TSK-MED002.title: MEDKIT: Mount and secure MedKit
TSK-MED002.description: Mount the MedKit in position and secure it with the locking mechanism.
instructions: Attach magnetic connector to front right.

TSK-WNC001.title: WINCH: Thread and attach line
TSK-WNC001.description:
Set up winch line for MedKit deployment.

Thread line through the red guide below drone.
Attach line securely to the spool.
Roll up line using button on winch housing.
Confirm spool spins smoothly with no abnormal noise.
instructions: Press and hold button to roll up line.

TSK-SKY001.title: SKYBASE: Complete environment and maintenance check
TSK-SKY001.description:
Final Skybase inspection and maintenance.

VISUAL MARKERS: Clean navigation markers.
VEGETATION: No overgrown foliage/grass.
CLEAN & SAFE: Secure tools, remove debris.
LIGHTS: Interior and external lights working.
RESTOCK: Note any items needing restocking.
CAMERAS: Clean all 8 dome cameras with microfiber.

TSK-FIN001.title: FINAL CHECK: Verify everything is ready
TSK-FIN001.description:
Final verification before arming PRS.

Ensure Ethernet port cap is screwed on.
Confirm drone is perfectly aligned.
Confirm lids are securely screwed on.
Verify all tools are secured.

TSK-DOC001.title: DOCUMENTATION: Write a note for inspection details
TSK-DOC001.description: Document the inspection details in the work order system.
instructions: Write a note with name, AirframeID, drone name, battery set.

TSK-DOC002.title: DOCUMENTATION: Report any abnormalities
TSK-DOC002.description:
Record any issues found during inspection.

Fill out Adverse Events form for any abnormalities.
Link: https://forms.gle/NF1nVe6F9GGWq5fZ8
instructions: If any issues found, open Adverse Events form.

TSK-PRE001.title: ARRIVAL TASKS: Battery check and drone preparation
TSK-PRE001.description:
Complete initial arrival tasks.

Verify spare batteries are fully charged (otherwise start charging).
Dry off any water, snow, or moisture on drone to prevent water entering during battery change.
instructions: Check spare batteries are fully charged.
Start charging if batteries not ready.
Dry off any moisture on drone.

TSK-PRE002.title: INSTRUCTION: Align the drone perfectly
TSK-PRE002.description: Position the drone precisely on the visual navigation marker for proper alignment.
instructions: Align drone over visual navigation marker.
Place front landing gear on the two dots in front of marker.
Ensure front camera faces correct direction.
Verify drone body perfectly aligned with visual navigation markers.

TSK-REM001.title: START CONDITIONS: Verify prerequisites
TSK-REM001.description: Confirm all prerequisites for remote inspection are met.
instructions: Confirm RemoteTI procedure is being used.
Check all 8 camera images are captured with good quality.
Confirm no personnel visible in hangar.

TSK-CAM001.title: CAMERA COVERAGE: Verify visual coverage
TSK-CAM001.description: Confirm critical areas are visible in captured images.
instructions: Verify drone visible from opposite corners.
STOP if critical areas not visible.

TSK-SAF002.title: SKYBASE SAFETY: Environment and obstacle check
TSK-SAF002.description: Inspect Skybase environment for safety hazards and foreign objects.
instructions: Scan floor for debris/tools in images.
Verify marker is clean and visible.

TSK-PWR003.title: UMBILICAL: Power connection and contact surfaces
TSK-PWR003.description: Inspect umbilical connection and contact surfaces.

TSK-PER003.title: SENSORS: Navigation and vision systems
TSK-PER003.description: Inspect sensor systems for proper condition.
instructions: Look for physical damage to housings.

TSK-PER004.title: ANTENNAS: Communication systems
instructions: Verify GPS masts intact and forward-facing.

TSK-PER005.title: PORTS & PERIPHERALS: Protective covers and accessories
instructions: Verify Ethernet and USB caps installed.
Confirm all ports have protective covers.
Locate downlight on front-right landing gear.

TSK-MED003.title: MEDKIT & WINCH: Payload system verification
TSK-MED003.description: Verify MedKit and winch system configuration.

TSK-SYS004.title: DRONE STATUS: Verify safe state
TSK-SYS004.description: Confirm drone is in expected safe state.
instructions: Verify drone stable on landing gear.
STOP if red lights or unexpected pattern.

TSK-SYS005.title: ALIGNMENT: Marker positioning
TSK-SYS005.description: Verify drone alignment with navigation marker.
instructions: Check drone centered on navigation marker.
Verify body parallel with marker lines.
Confirm landing legs symmetric to marker.

TSK-BAT006.title: BATTERY: Compartment inspection
instructions: Verify battery compartment lid completely closed.
Check 4 screws secured (2 on each side).
Ensure no gaps between lids and core.
Verify white seal visible and intact if observable.

TSK-SAF003.title: CRITICAL SAFETY: Skybase environment check
TSK-SAF003.description: Inspect Skybase environment for immediate safety hazards.
instructions: Check for debris/tools/loose objects on floor.
Verify clearance near propellers and landing gear.
Check doors/enclosure for obstruction or damage.
STOP if anything could interfere with safety.

TSK-SYS006.title: DRONE SAFE STATE: Post-flight condition
TSK-SYS006.description: Verify drone is in safe post-flight state.
instructions: Check stability on landing gear (no abnormal tip/lean).
Look for smoke, steam, liquid, or heat haze.

TSK-PRO002.title: PROPULSION: Visual danger check
TSK-PRO002.description: Quick visual inspection of propulsion system for immediate dangers.
instructions: Look for bent propellers or surface contact.
Check nav light pattern if visible.
STOP if propeller damaged or drone appears armed.

TSK-PWR004.title: UMBILICAL: Quick visual check
TSK-PWR004.description: Visual inspection of umbilical and charging area.
instructions: Check umbilical connector area for damage.
Look for soot/burn marks around contacts.
Verify no obvious mis-seat if connected.
STOP if area burned or connector misaligned.

TSK-PER006.title: PERIPHERALS: Quick inventory check
TSK-PER006.description: Fast visual check for missing or broken peripherals.
instructions: Verify GPS masts present and upright.
Look for ETH/USB caps if visible.
Check downlight and MiniFinder if visible.

TSK-SYS007.title: SYSTEM VITALS: UI status check
TSK-SYS007.description: Check system status from UI if available.
instructions: Check for critical warnings/faults in UI.
Check battery status reasonable for post-flight.
STOP if critical system fault present.

TSK-SYS008.title: ALIGNMENT: Marker positioning
TSK-SYS008.description: Verify drone alignment with navigation marker.
instructions: Check drone centered on navigation marker.
Verify body parallel with marker lines.
Confirm landing legs symmetric to marker.

TSK-PRO003.title: MOTORS: Test rotation by hand
TSK-PRO003.description: Spin each motor to check for bearing issues.
instructions: Rotate each of 8 propellers slowly by hand.
Listen for crackling or grinding sounds.
STOP if any resistance or noise detected.

TSK-PRO004.title: PROPELLERS: Quick visual inspection
TSK-PRO004.description: Quick check for obvious propeller damage.
instructions: Look for obvious chips or cracks.

TSK-EXT001.title: STRUCTURAL ANALYSIS: Complete airframe integrity check
TSK-EXT001.description:
Perform comprehensive structural analysis including NDT (Non-Destructive Testing) where applicable.

Conduct detailed crack inspection using magnification.
Check carbon fiber components for delamination.
Measure critical structural dimensions for deformation.
Perform tap testing on composite structures.
Document all findings with measurements.
instructions: Use magnifying equipment for crack detection
Perform tap test on all carbon fiber components

TSK-EXT002.title: ELECTRICAL SYSTEMS: Complete electrical testing and analysis
TSK-EXT002.description:
Comprehensive electrical system testing with measurements.

Measure resistance on all power connections.
Check voltage drop under load conditions.
Test all redundant power paths.
Verify grounding and shielding effectiveness.
Perform insulation resistance testing.
Check EMI/RFI compliance.
instructions: Perform load testing on power systems

TSK-EXT003.title: CALIBRATION: Full sensor and performance calibration
TSK-EXT003.description:
Complete calibration verification of all sensors and performance systems.

Perform full compass calibration with interference mapping.
Calibrate and verify all IMU sensors.
Check and adjust ESC timing and calibration.
Verify motor KV and performance curves.
Calibrate gimbal and verify stabilization performance.
Test and calibrate optical flow and ranging sensors.
instructions: Complete compass calibration with data logging
Verify IMU calibration values are within spec

TSK-EXT004.title: ENVIRONMENTAL: Temperature and vibration testing
TSK-EXT004.description:
Perform environmental stress testing within safe parameters.

Conduct vibration analysis using accelerometer data.
Test operation at temperature extremes (if chamber available).
Check seal integrity and water resistance.
Verify thermal management under stress conditions.
Test performance in simulated weather conditions.
instructions: Run vibration analysis across frequency spectrum

TSK-EXT005.title: LIFECYCLE: Component hour tracking and replacement assessment
TSK-EXT005.description:
Assess all components against lifecycle limits and replacement schedules.

Review flight hour logs for all critical components.
Check battery cycle count and capacity degradation.
Assess propeller hours and stress cycles.
Evaluate motor bearing wear indicators.
Review parachute deployment device expiration.
Verify all time-limited components are within limits.
instructions: Inspect wear indicators on all rotating components
Check expiration dates on safety equipment

TSK-PRE003.title: START CONDITIONS: Verify prerequisites
TSK-PRE003.description: Confirm all prerequisites for initial remote inspection are met.
instructions: Verify camera feeds are LIVE (check timestamps).
Confirm no people visible inside Skybase.
STOP if any condition cannot be confirmed.

TSK-SKY003.title: CRITICAL SAFETY: Skybase environment check
TSK-SKY003.description: Inspect Skybase environment for immediate safety hazards.
instructions: Check for debris/tools/loose objects on floor.
Verify clearance near propellers and landing gear.
Check doors/enclosure for obstruction or damage.
STOP if anything could interfere with safety.

TSK-PRO005.title: PROPULSION: Visual danger check
TSK-PRO005.description: Quick visual inspection of propulsion system for immediate dangers.
instructions: Look for bent propellers or surface contact.
Check nav light pattern if visible.
STOP if propeller damaged or drone appears armed.

TSK-FIN003.title: DISPATCH GATE: Go/No-Go decision
TSK-FIN003.description: Make dispatch decision based on inspection results.
instructions: If STOP: Do not dispatch, escalate immediately.

TSK-SVC001.title: MAINTENANCE: Scheduled component replacement
TSK-SVC001.description:
Replace time-limited components according to maintenance schedule.

Replace propellers if at hour limit.
Change dampeners and vibration isolators.
Replace battery if at cycle limit.
Update expired safety equipment.
Replace worn cable ties and protective sleeves.
instructions: Check maintenance schedule for due replacements

TSK-SVC002.title: LUBRICATION: Apply lubrication and protective coatings
TSK-SVC002.description:
Perform all lubrication and protection services.

Lubricate gimbal bearings if applicable.
Apply dielectric grease to electrical connections.
Lubricate folding propeller mechanisms.
Apply corrosion protection to exposed metal.
Clean and lubricate mechanical linkages.

TSK-SVC003.title: SOFTWARE: Firmware and software updates
TSK-SVC003.description:
Update all firmware and software to latest stable versions.

Update flight controller firmware.
Update ESC firmware if available.
Update companion computer software.
Update ground station software.
Verify parameter file after updates.
Test all functions after updates.

TSK-SVC004.title: CLEANING: Deep cleaning and inspection
TSK-SVC004.description:
Perform thorough cleaning of all components.

Clean all optical sensors and lenses.
Remove dust and debris from motors.
Clean cooling fins and heat sinks.
Clean electrical contacts and connectors.
Remove any corrosion or oxidation.
Clean and inspect propellers thoroughly.
instructions: Clean all camera lenses and sensors
Blow out motors with compressed air

TSK-SVC005.title: COMPLIANCE: Regulatory compliance and documentation
TSK-SVC005.description:
Ensure all regulatory compliance requirements are met.

Verify registration is current.
Check insurance documentation.
Update maintenance logbook.
Verify pilot certifications are current.
Ensure all required markings are legible.
File any required service bulletins.

TSK-STR005.title: DRONE STRUCTURE: Arms, core, and landing gear
TSK-STR005.description: Inspect drone structural components for integrity.
instructions: Inspect each motor arm for damage.

TSK-BAT007.title: BATTERY: Compartment inspection
instructions: Verify battery compartment lid completely closed.
Check 4 screws secured (2 on each side).
Ensure no gaps between lids and core.
Verify white seal visible and intact if observable.
